meanings.sent1: The canner filled jars with homemade jam.
meanings.sent2: My grandma is a skilled canner who preserves fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The canner joked that they were the 'jam master' of the family.
meanings.sent4: She was a canner extraordinaire, turning fresh produce into delicious preserves.
meanings.sent5: The canner's pantry was filled with colorful jars of pickles and jams.

meanings.definition: A device used for canning food.
meanings.sent1: The canner heated up to seal the jars tightly.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new canner to start preserving my garden harvest.
meanings.sent3: The canner beeped when the canning process was complete.
meanings.sent4: The canner hummed softly as it processed the jars of food.
meanings.sent5: Using the canner made the kitchen smell like summer all year round.

meanings.definition: A container for holding canned goods.
meanings.sent1: The kitchen shelf was lined with canners full of vegetables.
meanings.sent2: I placed the canner of soup on the stovetop to heat up.
meanings.sent3: The canner was so full, it was hard to close the cupboard door.
meanings.sent4: She opened the canner to find it filled with her favorite canned peaches.
meanings.sent5: The canner kept the food fresh and ready to eat whenever needed.
